entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -30.4°C

Visibility: 4.8 km

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 29. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 43 in the evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023
